column1: gearr- ‎(“short, brief; small, young; curt, abrupt; fair, moderate”)  gearró ‎(“recently”, adverb)  gearr sa radharc ‎(“short-sighted”)
column3: i bhfad agus i ngearr ‎(“far and near”)  i ngearr aimsire ‎(“in a short time”)
column5: is gearr (go) ‎(“it won't be long (until)”)  is gearr (ó) ‎(“it is not long (since)”)

column9: a ghearrann; a ghearras /a ngearrann*; a ngearras*

column8: a ghearrfaidh; a ghearrfas /a ngearrfaidh*; a ngearrfas*

column1: Note: Some of these forms may be hypothetical. Not everypossible mutated form of every word actually occurs.
